1.heading: Baron, Ken.
1.title: "Did Rex Tell You About June's Getting Engaged to Ken Baron?"
1.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Melissa thinks the inscrutable Rex is shaken up by the news.

2.heading: Baron, Ken.
2.title: "His Future is Uncertain"
2.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Ken Baron has M.S., and Brice Adams wants to know if June is sure she should marry him.

3.heading: Baron, Ken.
3.title: "I'll Go to the Airport with You, June!"
3.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: June tells Ken he should go practice his golf instead, so they kiss goodbye at the hotel.

4.heading: Baron, Ken.
4.title: "They Claim that this Golf Game is Seventy-Five Percent Mental!"
4.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Ken is talking about marriage to June, and says he's going to get in shape for the tournament; meanwhile Rex is upset and cancels his appointments.

5.heading: Baron, Ken.
5.title: "What About His Illness, the Multiple Sclerosis?"
5.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Rafe says he think Ken's going to make it back to the tour, and Rex says he's going to discharge Melissa.

6.heading: Baron, Ken.
6.title: "What are My Chances?"
6.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: Rex congratulates Ken on a fine round of golf, and Ken wants to know what the doctor can tell him about his remission from M.S.

7.heading: Baron, Ken.
7.title: "You've Got a Great Round Going, Ken! If you Par in, You'll have a Sixty-Five, a Course Record!"
7.author: by Dal Curtis ; Bradley and Edgington.
notes: Summary: June makes a lunch date with Brice Adam, while Ken's on the golf course.

121.heading: Baron Strucker.

122.heading: Baron Strucker.
122.title: "The Return of Baron Strucker"
122.author: Gary Friedrich, Dick Ayers, Syd Shores
notes: SUMMARY: Pacific Ocean, World War II. U.S. Marines and a Japanese "samurai squadron" meet on an island 500 miles north of Darwin while investigating a phantom submarine that has been sinking both allied and Japanese ships. The submarine belongs to renegade German Baron Strucker and his private army Hydra.

123.heading: Baron Strucker.
